title: What if Serrated dagger and Haunting Guise built into an assassin hybrid item...
body:
With a mask of Guy Fawkes having a dagger beard as the icon?

Considering that everyone is saying that akali and shaco feel subpar and both seem to be best built hybrid it might be time to add some more hybrid items to the game. Hybrid is returning to being the best build option for a few champs but they don't have the items open to them to make them preform well compared to others.

replies.body: {{champion:55}} hybrid items? I approve. {{champion:55}}

While Kat can make use of them the Lethality from a hybrid item like this would not do anything for her. This is jsut a suggesting to make hybrid champ who do both magic and physical damage in fairly large amounts able to have some flat penetration of some kind.

Kat does not do any physical damage outside of her auto attacks with the PBE changes.

She may only do Magic damage but she does still have scalings in both AD and AP and they are all fairly high, that's why some katarina mains who play the new kat use hextech gunblade, she makes amazing use of that item. I'm fairly sure though that she wouldn't use any other hybrid items even if they made a new one though.

{{champion:10}}  HYBRID ITEM?  DOES IT GIVE ATTACK SPEED?

{{champion:24}}  I heard hybrid?  Where can I buy said Hybrid?
She's losing a lot of her AD ratios in the upcoming rework.
Actually, just the opposite. She's gaining more powerful AD ratios in her Q, E, daggers, and keeping the already good one on her ult.
She only has magical damage now

She has AD ratio's on her Passive(her new spin when she picks up a dagger has 125% AD and AP) her E and her R as well. Even though it's only Bonus AD it's still good scaling because Hextech Gunblade is an incredible item on her.

Even if she doesn't deal both damage she does have scaling in both.
But why would she need a hybrid **penetration** item??? Just get a magic penetration and full AD item

She doesn't but hybrid items such as Gunblade do work on her just because she gains massive benefits from the raw stats, active and passives. She would probably still buy it regardless of whether lethality helps her or not if the active/passive effect was good enough. Not to mention if it gave both penetrations, she'd totally get it because not many items give magic pen that she actually wants to buy every single game.

AD ratios doesn't= Physical damage, all she does now is magic damage that has AD ratios on it. She has no need for hybrid penetration.

I'm talking about after the rework btw.

Yeah i know, i stated that. But basically, an item that gave her flat Magic Penetration would still be great for her even if she can't use the Lethality portion, having flat magic pen is amazing since a lot of other items that give it she doesn't want such as haunting guise since she doesn't want liandry's torment. Then even if it didn't give a huge amount of AP or AD, she can still utilize both stats and finally if the passive or active items effects are still useful to her, such as with Gunblade. Chances are she'll still buy it just like with Gunblade.

Jax is outside the point.
You were saying "We probably shouldn't have a hybrid pen item because AP itemization is too good already"
I countered "AP Champions don't buy the only already existing hybrid item, Gunblade"
Jax is a AD/hybrid champion, so he's aside the point
The only AP champion who could possibly stand to abuse a potential hybrid pen item would be Teemo, and that guy already exists so far outside normal itemization patterns that he barely even counts

I would actually be far more worried about AD champions' potential to abuse it than AP.

teemo is also a "hybrid" by your definitions since he can go ap and ad .

stop making it so whoever YOU want to be hybrid or not goes through

Hybrid isn't about going AP _or_ AD, its about going _both_
If it was about the ability to go one or the other, then a huge portion of champions who aren't hybrid could be considered hybrid.
Of course, its hard to determine who is actually hybrid because of the fact that there's only one hybrid item (well, two I guess, Guinsoo's is kind of its own thing though).
The following champions are genuine hybrids:
{{champion:82}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:10}}{{champion:35}} {{champion:55}} 
(shaco, kat, and akali are becoming even more hybrid oriented in their upcoming reworks too)

Now, there are lots of champions who _could_ be hybrid but have never really gotten the chance to be because of a lack of itemization

Now, regardless of who is or isn't hybrid (because it really doesn't matter much for this) the simple fact is pure AP champions just don't build Gunblade, so you don't have to worry about other hybrid items being potentially abused by AP champions.
Nobody who isn't stupid builds shaco hybrid right now. You either go full ap or full ad. You don't even but gunblade because it gimps your damage in either build really hard.

All Champs that are Hybrid are toxic, or were toxic at some point, as you can't itemize vs it.

If you're playing a Juggernaut, Bruiser, Tank, or Vanguard, you'll need early defensive items. In the case of the vast majority of champs that aren't true tanks,  you'll be getting one offensive item as your core. You need an early option for hybridization, not GA, which is meant for lategame.

You do realise hybrid damage only starts to become a problem around mid-late game. If i would fight a hybrid fizz or ekko i would definitely rush mr first, since their ad isnt a problem early game. Same goes with kayle and teemo. I would most likely rush {{item:3211}} into {{item:3047}} into {{item:3065}}. Most hybrid champions are mostly ap early game so it isnt a problem for burisers/juggernauts/tanks/vanguards. Its only mid-late game when they got items like {{item:3124}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3153}} that you need armor
